</body> 
***уздечка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чка</a> (19860)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">узде́ц-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uzdéc-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzdéčka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:bridle.html>bridle</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:headgear.html>headgear</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:horse.html>horse</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:anatomy.html>anatomy</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> frenulum, frenum</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:bridle.html>bridle</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узда.html>узда́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzdá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцы́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzdcý</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>де́ч<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узд-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ечк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="анатомическое">анат.</span> перепончатое <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ограничивающий.html>ограни́чивающее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подвижность.html>подви́жность</a> какого-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:орган.html>органа</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:часть.html>части</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>У</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:взрослый.html>взро́слых</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мужчина.html>мужчи́н</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:короткий.html>коро́ткая</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; </body> 
***уздцы.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцы́</a> (21555)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцы́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzdcý</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr> <abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцо́в</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:only.html>only</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:bridle.html>bridle</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:брать.html>брать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцы́</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">bratʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:pod.html>pod</a> <b>uzdcý</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:take.html>take</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:rein.html>reins</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узда.html>узда́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzdá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:уздечка.html>узде́чка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzdéčka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узда.html>у́зд</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>цы́</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> мн. lt;м 5*bgt;  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> ед. ч. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуются</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узд-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:щупальце.html>-ц</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ы</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> сочет. <a href = vnd.unilang:брать.html>брать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уздцы.html>уздцы́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. п.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:узда.html>узда́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:повод.html>пово́дья</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:около.html>о́коло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удила.html>уди́л</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

</body> 
***узел.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a> (2251)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*ǫzlъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:knot.html>knot</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:doublet.html>Doublet</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:вензель.html>ве́нзель</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">vénzelʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>borrowing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Polish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:polish.html>Polish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="pl">węzeł</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>Cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">ѫзлъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ǫzlŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">úzel</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>узла́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>узлы́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>узло́в</a></b>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***узелок.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узело́к</a> (6726)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">úzel</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о́к</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ók</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узело́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzelók</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узелка́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узелки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узелко́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">úzel</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:knot.html>knot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:nodule.html>nodule</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:parcel.html>parcel</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:bundle.html>bundle</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>зе<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ло́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узел-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ок</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***узенький.html

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у́</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>зень<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:кий.html>кий</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3*a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-уз-</b>; суффикс: <b>-еньк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

Гоголь</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:невский.html>Невский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:проспект.html>проспе́кт</a>», <span class="example-date">1835</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Нестор Катин <a href = vnd.unilang:носить.html>носи́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:косоворотка.html>косоворо́тку</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:подпоясанный.html>подпоя́санную</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узенький.html>у́зеньким</a></span> ремнём〈…〉 <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BC" class="extiw" title="w:Горький, Максим">Максим <a href = vnd.unilang:горький.html>Го́рький</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>Жизнь</a> Клима Самгина», <a href = vnd.unilang:часть.html>Часть</a> 1, <span class="example-date">1925</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol>

</body> 
***узкий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узкий.html>у́зкий</a> (1056)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*ǫzъkъ</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*h₂énǵʰus</i>. Cognates <a href = vnd.unilang:include.html>include</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Armenian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:armenian.html>Armenian</a></a></span> <i class="Armn mention" lang="hy">անձուկ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="hy-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">anjuk</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:narrow.html>narrow</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language"><a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href = vnd.unilang:eng.html>eng</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:narrow.html>narrow</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Irish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:irish.html>Irish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="ga">cúng</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:narrow.html>narrow</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">angustus</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:narrow.html>narrow</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanskrit" class="extiw" title="w:Sanskrit"><a href = vnd.unilang:sanskrit.html>Sanskrit</a></a></span> <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa">अंहु</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">aṃhu</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:narrow.html>narrow</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узкий.html>у́зкий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">úzkij</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)<a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>у́же</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:superlative.html>superlative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узча́йший</b>)
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:tight.html>tight</a></li>

<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>мне</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́ти</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:штаны.html>штаны́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:узкий.html>у́зки</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">mne éti štaný <b>úzki</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>these</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:trousers.html>trousers</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:too.html>too</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tight.html>tight</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:me.html>me</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>у́з</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:кий.html>кий</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>". <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a>  |  <i><a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>у́же</a></i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узк-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

Куприн</a>, «Суламифь», <span class="example-date">1908</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсюда.html>Отсю́да</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подниматься.html>поднима́лась</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узкий.html>у́зкая</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:деревянный.html>деревя́нная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лестница.html>ле́стница</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чердак.html>черда́к</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%AE%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%9E%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Домбровский, Юрий Осипович">Ю. <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>О</a>. ***узкоглазый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узкоглазый.html>узкогла́зый</a> (29277)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ко.html>ко</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>гла́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>зый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узк-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-глаз-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узкий.html>у́зкий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:разрез.html>разре́з</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глаз.html>глаз</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="выступает в роли существительного">субстантивир.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="грубое"><a href = vnd.unilang:грубый.html>груб</a>.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:азиатский.html>азиа́тской</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раса.html>ра́сы</a>, монголоид <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>

<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:середина.html>середи́не</a> ― <a href = vnd.unilang:вертикальный.html>вертика́льная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лестница.html>ле́стница</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наверх.html>наве́рх</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бок.html>бокам</a> ― <a href = vnd.unilang:висячий.html>вися́чие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:шест.html>шесты́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> лазания, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нарост.html>наро́сты</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:утолщение.html>утолще́ния</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:искривить.html>искривлённый</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ствол.html>стволе́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ветвь.html>ветвя́х</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>корня́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дерево.html>дере́вьев</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:старый.html>Ста́рые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сосна.html>сосны</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:осина.html>оси́ны</a> ― <a href = vnd.unilang:могучий.html>могу́чие</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловатый.html>узлова́тые</a></span>, ― <a href = vnd.unilang:расти.html>росли́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:там.html>там</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:часто.html>ча́сто</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:необыкновенный.html>необыкнове́нно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:величественный.html>вели́чественно</a>… <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Д. Скалдин, «<a href = vnd.unilang:странствие.html>Стра́нствия</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:приключение.html>приключе́ния</a> Никодима <a href = vnd.unilang:старший.html>Ста́ршего</a>», <span class="example-date">1917</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:утолщение.html>утолще́ния</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:припухлость.html>припу́хлости</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сустав.html>суста́вах</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:вена.html>ве́нах</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лежать.html>лежа́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:высокий.html>высоко</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:спина.html>спине́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свои́ми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:маленький.html>ма́ленькими</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:костлявый.html>костля́выми</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:покрытый.html>покры́тыми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лиловый.html>лило́выми</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловатый.html>узлова́тыми</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:жилка.html>жи́лками</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ручка.html>ру́чками</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:одеяло.html>одея́ле</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> уставленным <a href = vnd.unilang:прямо.html>пря́мо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:левый.html>ле́вым</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глаз.html>гла́зом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> скосившимся <a href = vnd.unilang:правый.html>пра́вым</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глаз.html>гла́зом</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неподвижный.html>неподви́жными</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бровь.html>бровя́ми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:губа.html>губами</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B9,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%B2_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Толстой, Лев Николаевич">Л. Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>То́лстой</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:война.html>Война́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мир.html>мир</a>», <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>Том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:третий.html>тре́тий</a>, <span class="example-date">1867-1869</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> несхожее <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отцовский.html>отцо́вским</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лицо́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:носить.html>носи́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отпечаток.html>отпеча́ток</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отцовский.html>отцо́вского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выражение.html>выраже́ния</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рука.html>руки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:запутанный.html>запу́танный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сложный.html>сло́жный</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>Жизнь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:семья.html>семьи</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:клан.html>кла́на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глубокий.html>глубока́</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловатый.html>узлова́та</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:таинственный.html>таи́нственна</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:зачастую.html>зачасту́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:страшный.html>страшна́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D1%83%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Бунин, Иван Алексеевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. ***узловой.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>узловой</a> (25519)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">úzel</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ово́й</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ovój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>узлово́й</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzlovój</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:junction.html>junction</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:transfer.html>transfer</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>узлово́й</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:аэропорт.html>аэропо́рт</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>uzlovój</b> aeropórt</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:hub.html>hub</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:airport.html>airport</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:junction.html>junction</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:airport.html>airport</a></span>”)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:nodal.html>nodal</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:nodular.html>nodular</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>узлово́й</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:зоб.html>зоб</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>uzlovój</b> zob</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/thyroid_nodule" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:thyroid nodule"><a href = vnd.unilang:thyroid.html>thyroid</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nodule.html>nodule</a></a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:nodular.html>nodular</a></b> goiter</span>”)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:pivotal.html>pivotal</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:key.html>key</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:main.html>main</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:central.html>central</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>у́зел</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">úzel</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узелок.html>узело́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzelók</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловатый.html>узлова́тый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzlovátyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>узловой</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узл-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ов</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:являться.html>явля́ющийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узел.html>узло́м</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>Узлова́я</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:станция.html>ста́нция</a>. <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узловой.html>Узловой</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:пункт.html>пункт</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***узнававший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́вший</a> (4256)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́вший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uznavávšij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uznavátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́вший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>

***узнаваемый.html

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>е<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>узнава́емее, узнава́емей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-зна-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ва-ем</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:легко.html>легко́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>узна́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:опознать.html>опозна́ть</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знакомый.html>знако́мые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:черта.html>черты́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:признак.html>при́знаки</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:невероятный.html>Невероя́тные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:событие.html>собы́тия</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:перемешиваться.html>переме́шиваются</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вполне.html>вполне́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнаваемый.html>узнава́емыми</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизненный.html>жи́зненными</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поступок.html>посту́пками</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A0%D1%8F%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%AD%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Рязанов, Эльдар Александрович">Э. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <li><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:известный.html>изве́стен</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:много.html>мно́гим</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> 1991 <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>го́ду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:запад.html>За́паде</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:провести.html>провели́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:опрос.html>опро́сы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ребенок.html>дете́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удивление.html>удивле́нием</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выяснить.html>вы́яснили</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:персонаж.html>персона́ж</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:компьютерный.html>компью́терных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:игра.html>игр</a> Марио <a href = vnd.unilang:более.html>бо́лее</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:знакомый.html>знако́мый</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:известный.html>известный</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>уз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>е<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мый</b>
</p><p>Страдательное <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:настоящий.html>настоя́щего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-зна-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ва-ем</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>страд. прич. <a href = vnd.unilang:наст.html>наст</a>. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>Во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:второй.html>второ́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сцена.html>сце́не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:перед.html>пе́ред</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дворец.html>дворцо́м</a> Глостера <a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>но́вый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слуга.html>слуга́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лира.html>Ли́ра</a>, Кент, <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́емый</a></span> Лиром, <a href = vnd.unilang:без.html>без</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:всякое.html>вся́кого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:повод.html>по́вода</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:начинать.html>начина́ет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ругать.html>руга́ть</a> Освальда (<a href = vnd.unilang:дворецкий.html>дворе́цкого</a> Гонерилы). <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B9,_%D0%9B%D0%B5%D0%B2_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Толстой, Лев Николаевич">Л. Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>То́лстой</a></a>, «<a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%9E_%D0%A8%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B5_%D0%B8_%D0%BE_%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B5_(%D0%A2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B9)" class="extiw" title="s:О Шекспире и о драме (Толстой)"><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>О</a> Шекспире <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:драма.html>дра́ме</a></a>», <span class="example-date">1904</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span style="font-size:smaller;"></span></span></i>(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/" class="extiw" title="s:">Викитеки</a>)<i></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***узнавание.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>узнавание</a> (21185)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uznavátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-а́ние</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ánije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>узнава́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uznavánije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавание.html>узнава́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавание.html>узнава́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавание.html>узнава́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:cognizance.html>cognizance</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:recognition.html>recognition</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>зна<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-зна-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ва-ниj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***узнавать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a> (4256)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>узна́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uznátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ва́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-vátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uznavátʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>узна́ть</a></b>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>зна<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́ть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 13b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>узна́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-зна-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ва</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:идентифицировать.html>идентифици́ровать</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:признавать.html>признава́ть</a>, опознавать, <a href = vnd.unilang:распознавать.html>распознава́ть</a></li>

***узнавший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узнавший.html>узна́вший</a> (252)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узнавший.html>узна́вший</a></b>

Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:узнавать.html>узнава́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>у-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-зна-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>То́лстой</a></a>, «Анна Каренина»<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:идентифицировать.html>идентифици́ровать</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:опознать.html>опозна́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:признать.html>призна́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:распознать.html>распозна́ть</a></li>

</body> 
***узнающий.html

***узник.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узник.html>у́зник</a> (8703)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>у́зы</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">úzy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ник</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узник.html>у́зник</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">úznik</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узник.html>у́зника</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узник.html>у́зники</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узник.html>у́зников</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">у́зница</b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узы.html>у́з</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:никнуть.html>ни́к</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-уз-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ник</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***узор.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́р</a> (7859)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:inherit.html>Inherited</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">узоръ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uzorŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:зреть.html>зреть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">zretʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:look.html>look</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>see</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́р</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzór</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́ра</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́ры</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́ров</a></b>)
</p>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узористый</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzoristyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорный.html>узо́рный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzornyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорчатый.html>узо́рчатый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzórčatyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узорить</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzoritʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узориться</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzoritʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">разузорить</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">razuzoritʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">разузориться</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">razuzoritʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узорничать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzorničatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">узористо</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzoristo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорный.html>узо́рно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzórno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорчатый.html>узо́рчато</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzorčato</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:узорный.html>узо́рный</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узор-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́ры</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:украшенный.html>укра́шенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́рами</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>узорочный (устар.)</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:узорчатый.html>узо́рчатый</a></li></ol>
</body> 
***узорчатый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узорчатый.html>узо́рчатый</a> (17655)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́р</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">uzór</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-чатый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-čatyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорчатый.html>узо́рчатый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzórčatyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)узо́рчатее</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)узо́рчатей</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:pattern.html>patterned</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́р</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzór</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узорный.html>узо́рный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uzórnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>зо́р<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ча<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>узо́рчатее, узо́рчатей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-узор-</b>; суффикс: <b>-чат</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***узреть.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:узреть.html>узре́ть</a> (15211)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">у-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">u-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:зреть.html>зреть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">zretʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узреть.html>узре́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">uzrétʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:зреть.html>зреть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:date.html>dated</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:literary.html>literary</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>see</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:behold.html>behold</a></li>
